law.catch_line: By September 15 of each year, the Commission shall issue a report to the Montgomery County and Princ...

text.section:
By September 15 of each year, the Commission shall issue a report to the Montgomery County and Prince George's County Senate and House Delegations to the Maryland General Assembly concerning:
the implementation and administration of the minority business enterprise programs under this subtitle for the fiscal year ending on the preceding June 30; and
appropriate recommendations concerning the programs.

section.section: The Commission may conduct an impartial fact-finding study in connection with a minority business enterprise program for consistency with applicable law.
The Commission shall report the findings of a study completed under this subsection to the Montgomery County and Prince George's County Senate and House Delegations to the Maryland General Assembly.
